title: Pharmacist Training Education: Designing Online Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental pharmaceutical theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments utilizing Web 2.0 tools and LMS (Learning Management Systems)

learning_goals: Learners can design patient-specific medication management projects (20-minute duration) using digital tools
Learners can analyze online modules according to evaluation criteria following SCORM 2004 standards
Learners can submit improved educational content incorporating peer feedback through formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
